content:
for communication language @Sandro Zbinden wants to add de-CH for a patient. in http://hl7.org/fhir/valueset-languages.html de-CH has a display of German (Switzerland). The java validator / IG publisher returns a warning that this display name is not correct and should be German (Region=Switzerland):

Patient/FranzMuster: Patient.communication[0].language (l102/c15)   warning The display "German (Switzerland)" is not a valid display for the code {urn:ietf:bcp:47}de-CH - should be one of ["German (Region=Switzerland)"]

We can't find anywhere a definition for German (Region=Switzerland). Is that an issue in tx.fhir.org or is the ValueSet languages for this not relevant?

tx.fhir.org will accept German (Switzerland) next time I upgrade it.

I wonder if anyone has translated the IANA registry on which that code system is based?
